item.title: How The Government Shutdown Could Affect Public Health
item.description: The October 1st government shutdown could threaten public health in a variety of ways. A physician explains what is at stake.

item.title: Cloud Teams Face A GenAI Tsunami They’re Not Ready For
item.description: Cloud leaders expect a 50% rise in AI demand, yet many DevOps teams admit they’re already stretched thin and unprepared to scale infrastructure.

item.title: A Surprising Update On ‘Wayward’ Season 2 On Netflix
item.description: Will there be a season 2 of Wayward on Netflix? There's a new update on that front as the show continues to dominate the charts.
